dcterms:description: A dataset for sentiment analysis containing sentences annotated with sentiment labels, used to evaluate the effectiveness of the Flooding method in improving adversarial robustness.
dcterms:title: SST-2

dcterms:creator: William B. Dolan
Chris Brockett
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of paraphrased sentences, used to assess the performance of models in paraphrase detection tasks.
dcterms:title: MRPC

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: A dataset for question answering that includes over 100,000 questions based on a set of Wikipedia articles, used to evaluate models on natural language inference tasks.
dcterms:title: QNLI

dcterms:creator: Andrew L. Maas
Raymond E. Daly
Peter T. Pham
Dan Huang
Andrew Y. Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: A dataset for sentiment analysis containing movie reviews labeled with positive or negative sentiment, used to evaluate the effectiveness of models in sentiment classification tasks.
dcterms:title: IMDB

dcterms:creator: Xiang Zhang
Junbo Jake Zhao
Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: A dataset for news categorization that includes articles from various categories, used to evaluate models on text classification tasks.
dcterms:title: AG News
